description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Chicago 2016
http://gotochgo.com

Bodil Stokke - Functional Programming Hipster & Lead Web Developer at Trading Technologies

ABSTRACT
The ECMAScript 2015 specification introduced iterators, which generalise iteration over common data structures, as well as providing an interface for allowing you to iterate over any custom data structures using common language constructs. ES2015 also introduced [...]

title: The Miracle of Generators
